codes.ARNU: Number assigned by a social security agency to identify a non-resident person.
codes.BANK: Unique and unambiguous assignment made by a specific bank or similar financial institution to identify a relationship as defined between the bank and its client.
codes.CCPT: Number assigned by an authority to identify the passport number of a person.
codes.CUST: Number assigned by an issuer to identify a customer.
codes.DRLC: Number assigned by an authority to identify a driver's license.
codes.EMPL: Number assigned by a registration authority to an employee.
codes.NIDN: Number assigned by an authority to identify the national identity number of a person.
codes.SOSE: Number assigned by an authority to identify the social security number of a person.
codes.TELE: Number assigned by a telephone or mobile phone operator to identify a person. A person may have multiple phone numbers.
codes.TXID: Number assigned by a tax authority to identify a person.

description: Specifies the external person identification scheme name code in the format of character string with a maximum length of 4 characters.
name: ExternalPersonIdentification1Code
